scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/api && wrangler d1 migrations apply crm-db --local
scripts.db:migrate:prod: cd apps/api && wrangler d1 migrations apply crm-db --remote
scripts.db:backup: mkdir -p backups && cd apps/api && wrangler d1 export crm-db --remote --output=../../backups/crm-db-$(date +%Y%m%d).sql
